Welcome to topsearch's documentation!
=====================================

Topsearch is a Python package designed for topographical analysis of machine learning models and physical systems.
Here you will find links to all the relevant documentation needed to get started! 

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4
   :caption: Contents:
   
   about
   introduction
   installation
   tutorials
   modules/modules
